description:
You need a website, but you don't code, so Wordpress is out of the question.

Blogspot is not difficult to learn, or difficult to hack for content & affiliate marketing purposes- if you know how.

In this course I guide you, step by step, to create your own professional content/affiliate website using free hosting on Google's world-class blogging platform, Blogspot. I also show you how to fully SEO optimize your site without installing fancy plugins, using your own dedicated hosting, or paying a third party. I teach you best practices for content marketing, site layout, and SEO meta descriptions.

Using any computer and any browser, you can build your own website in under 45 minutes. The time you save getting your website seen by Google and other search engines more than pays for the cost of the course.
title: "Blogspot is Awesome!"Make a Pro Blogspot Site in 45 Minutes
